text: Shinedown is an American hard rock band from Jacksonville, Florida. They were formed by singer Brent Smith in 2001 after the dissolution of his previous band, Dreve. Smith, still under contract with record label Atlantic Records, recruited the band's original lineup of Jasin Todd as guitarist, Brad Stewart on bass, and Barry Kerch on drums. == Discography == Studio albums * Leave a Whisper (2003) * Us and Them (2005) * The Sound of Madness (2008) * Amaryllis (2012) * Threat to Survival (2015) * Attention Attention (2018) * Planet Zero (2022) Category:2001 establishments in the United States Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2001
